# Tiago Danin - Complete Professional Profile

**Mobile Developer | Bug Hunter | Open Source Enthusiast**

Website: https://tiagodanin.com | LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/tiagodanin | Email: TiagoDanin@outlook.com

## Personal Introduction

Hi, I am **Tiago Danin**, a passionate Mobile Developer with expertise in Java, Kotlin, Obj-C, Swift, React Native, and Flutter. I'm also experienced in front-end, back-end, and desktop development for macOS & Linux. I'm passionate about open source, automation, and solving real-world problems, always looking for new challenges. Currently diving into Digital Marketing to expand my knowledge beyond coding.

Outside of work, I'm a runner, dancer, and music lover‚Äîalways seeking new ways to grow, challenge myself, and enjoy life. Let's build something amazing together! üöÄ

## Areas of Expertise

### Mobile Development
Native and cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift, and more.

### Full Stack Development
End-to-end web solutions with modern frontend technologies and robust backend systems using React, Node.js, and various databases.

### Cybersecurity
Implementation of security best practices, penetration testing, and secure coding principles to protect applications and data.

### DevOps & CI/CD
Streamlined deployment processes, cloud infrastructure, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

## Professional Experience

### **Idopter Labs** | Mobile Developer | 2022 ‚Äî Present
Development of hybrid solutions with React Native and Flutter, system architectures, project documentation, and test creation. Sometimes I work on Backend with Elixir (Phoenix) or Frontend.

**Key responsibilities and achievements:**
- App submission to stores (Google Play and App Store)
- Integration/creation of native libraries (iOS and Android) in Swift, Objc, Java, and Kotlin for React Native apps
- Platform management: AppCenter, Firebase, Onesignal
- REST API Integration
- React Native project architecture and structure
- Implementation and improvement of automated tests using Jest

### **VoxData Technology** | Mobile Developer | 2019 ‚Äî 2022
Development of native (Java, Swift, and Objc) and hybrid (Quasar, React Native) mobile solutions, system architectures, project documentation, and test creation.

**Key mobile development skills:**
- App submission to stores (Google Play and App Store)
- Firebase Test Lab and Firebase Cloud Messaging
- Integration/creation of native libraries with hybrid applications
- REST API Integration
- Android architecture and structure

### **HackerOne** | Independent Security Researcher - Freelance | 2018 ‚Äî Present
Conducted vulnerability assessments for HackerOne partners, reporting security flaws to developers for remediation.

**Key analysis skills:**
- Cross-site scripting (XSS)
- Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
- Open Redirect
- Inadequate authentication procedures
- Android app reverse engineering

### **IssueHunt** | Backend Developer - Freelance | 2018 ‚Äî 2019
Developed and maintained Node.js applications and contributed to open source projects.

## Volunteer Work & Community Involvement

- **Devs Norte** | Organizador | 2019 ‚Äî Present
- **Node.js** | Documentation Translator | 2023 ‚Äî Present
- **ElectronJS** | Documentation Translator | 2017 ‚Äî Present
- **BrazilJS** | Event Organizer - On The Road Bel√©m | 2019
- **Node.js** | i18n Team Member | 2018 ‚Äî 2023
- **Synko** | Software Developer | 2014 ‚Äî 2019

## Featured Projects

### **BICOS**
An Open Banking application developed during a hackathon hosted by TecBan (company responsible for Banco24Horas ATMs). The project won the competition by showing that users don't need to understand Open Banking to benefit from it.

### **CAM Covers**
An application that transforms ordinary photos into professional-looking album covers, inspired by real music players. Available on Google Play Store.

### **React Native - Zendesk SDK**
A wrapper for Zendesk SDK in React Native, making it easy to integrate customer support functionality into your mobile apps.

### **Stone World**
A puzzle game set in a stone world, developed with Unity 3D. Coming soon!

### **The Slime Dungeon**
Survive in a dungeon of slimes! You are stuck with adorable creatures. How long can you survive? Built with Flutter and Bonfire engine.

### **Virtual Pocket Air Conditioning**
Have a virtual air conditioner in your pocket! This relaxing sound app provides better sleep. Created as a fun project to study animations in Flutter. Available on Google Play Store.

**Total Projects:** Over 350 projects across various platforms including GitHub, NPM, Google Play, and private repositories.

## Technical Skills

### Mobile Development
- **Frameworks:** Flutter, React Native, Xamarin, Ionic
- **Native Languages:** Java, Kotlin, Obj-C, Swift
- **UI Frameworks:** SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose

### DevOps & Cloud Platforms
- **CI/CD:** GitLab CI/CD, GitHub CI/CD
- **Cloud Services:** Firebase, Azure, Google Cloud
- **Containerization:** Docker

### Frontend Technologies
- **Languages:** HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript
- **Frameworks:** React, Vue.js
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS

### Backend Technologies
- **Runtime:** Node.js
- **Frameworks:** Express
- **Languages:** Elixir
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, SQLite

### Design & Prototyping
- **Tools:** Figma, Adobe XD, Canva
- **Specialties:** Mobile UX Design

### Game Development
- **Engines:** Unity, Flame, L√ñVE
- **Skills:** Pixel Art, Blender (3D modeling)

### Soft Skills
- Leadership
- Team Management
- Problem Solving
- Communication
- Organization

## Recent Talks & Presentations (2023-2025)

### **"Desenvolvimento Mobile: por onde come√ßar"** | Jul 2025
*Studio Code Meetup 2025*
Descubra por onde come√ßar no desenvolvimento mobile com um roadmap pr√°tico, compara√ß√£o entre tecnologias (Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, etc.) e dicas para conseguir o primeiro emprego na √°rea ‚Äî mesmo come√ßando do zero. Inclui estrat√©gias para destacar seu perfil no LinkedIn, construir projetos e encontrar vagas.

### **"O papel das Feature Flags na entrega cont√≠nua de Aplicativos Mobile"** | Jun 2025
*DevOpsDays Bel√©m 2025*
Transforme seu fluxo de CI/CD mobile em uma poderosa ferramenta para experimenta√ß√£o cont√≠nua. Vamos explorar como utilizar Feature Flags e testes A/B para validar funcionalidades, personalizar a experi√™ncia do usu√°rio e aumentar as vendas, sem depender de novos lan√ßamentos.

### **"O Ingrediente Secreto dos apps de sucesso: Teste A/B com Firebase"** | Dec 2024
*DevFest Bel√©m 2024*
Descubra como os Testes A/B e Firebase s√£o usados pelos maiores apps do mercado para criar experi√™ncias din√¢micas e adaptadas ao usu√°rio. Abordemos desde a configura√ß√£o at√© casos pr√°ticos que mostram o impacto dessas ferramentas na reten√ß√£o e engajamento.

### **"Gerenciando Certificados e Perfis Na App Store com Fastlane Match"** | Mar 2024
*Idopter Labs Talks 2024*
Gerenciar certificados e perfis na App Store √© uma etapa crucial do desenvolvimento de aplicativos m√≥veis. Lightning Talk sobre automa√ß√£o com Fastlane.

### **"DevOps para Desenvolvimento Mobile"** | Nov 2023
*DevOpsDays Bel√©m 2023*
Descubra o caminho para a automa√ß√£o no desenvolvimento mobile! Desafios √∫nicos, diferen√ßas essenciais do DevOps mobile e segredos para superar barreiras na distribui√ß√£o de apps nas lojas.

### **"Construindo lista perfomaticas no React Native"** | May 2023
*Idopter Labs Talks 2023*
Aprenda como usar o FlashList pode tornar suas listas mais perform√°ticas e assim evitar os problemas comuns associados ao FlatList.

Se voc√™ acompanhou a WWDC 2025 ou j√° deu uma olhada no iOS 26, viu aquele efeito novo por todo o sistema operacional de vidro molhado, com blur. Mas ser√° que a gente realmente precisa disso no Flutter?

SaaS criados no embalo da IA est√£o falhando no b√°sico: seguran√ßa. Nesse artigo, eu te mostro um dos maiores problemas que venho encontrando em v√°rios produtos feitos com ferramentas no estilo Vibe Coding: bancos de dados completamente expostos, sem nenhuma pol√≠tica m√≠nima de seguran√ßa.

Hi I am

# Tiago Danin

Mobile DeveloperBug Hunter

I'm a Mobile Developer with expertise in Java, Kotlin, Obj-C, Swift, React Native, and Flutter, also experienced in front-end, back-end, and desktop development for macOS & Linux. Passionate about open source, automation, and solving real-world problems, always looking for new challenges. Currently diving into Digital Marketing to expand my knowledge beyond coding.  
Outside of work, I'm a runner, dancer, and music lover‚Äîalways seeking new ways to grow, challenge myself, and enjoy life. Let's build something amazing together! üöÄ

## My Expertise

Areas where I excel and can help bring your ideas to life.

### Mobile Development

Native and cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter, React Native, Kotlin, Swift, and more.

### Full Stack Development

End-to-end web solutions with modern frontend technologies and robust backend systems using React, Node.js, and various databases.

### Cybersecurity

Implementation of security best practices, penetration testing, and secure coding principles to protect applications and data.

### DevOps & CI/CD

Streamlined deployment processes, cloud infrastructure, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

## GitHub

### Add-License-Bot

Archived

Generate LICENSE file from package.json

### Android-Debug-Bridge-MCP

MCP plugin to control Android devices via ADB (Android Debug Bridge) for automation, testing, and agent integration.

### AndroidManifestExported

A CLI tool to extract exported components and intent filters from AndroidManifest.xml files. This tool helps security researchers and developers identify potentially vulnerable Android components that are exposed to other applications.
